Description.Text: The Doubletree New York Hotel - JFK Airport is conveniently located adjacent to John F. Kennedy International Airport and offers a prime location for business or leisure travel to New York City. Complimentary 24-hour shuttle service to JFK Airport and the AirTrain station connecting to Manhattan is available, as well as on site parking and easy access to bustling Queens suburbs such as Howard Beach, Far Rockaway, Cedarhurst and Atlantic Beach.
• St. John's University - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi • Belmont Park - 8.3 km / 5.1 mi

The warmly furnished, modern guest rooms at this New York, NY hotel feature luxurious Sweet Dreams beds, dual-line phones, and complimentary high-speed wireless internet access. Spacious King or Double Bedded Room: newly appointed contemporary style rooms provide comfort and style with upscale amenities. All rooms feature Doubletree's Sweet Dreams Bed, high speed wireless internet access, a large functional work desk with convenient lighting, desktop outlet access and dual line phones with guest voice mail. Other standard amenities include clock radios, iron and ironing board

The Doubletree Hotel JFK Airport serves international cuisine at Café 140. The hotel's business center is open 24 hours daily. Complimentary newspapers are provided in the lobby. Meeting and event space is available. This New York hotel offers complimentary wireless Internet access. The front desk is open 24 hours a day and offers safe-deposit boxes. The hotel includes a fitness center and saunas. Photographs of New York are displayed throughout the hotel and guestrooms.

Check-In: 3:00 PM - Check-Out: 12:00 PM
Pets: No Pets Allowed

From Manhattan: Via the midtown tunnel to Long Island Expressway to the Grand Central Parkway. Take the Grand Central Parkway to the Van Wyck South, proceed on the Van Wyck to Exit 2 Rockaway Blvd., at the light which is Rockaway Blvd. turn left and proceed to 140th St. then turn right onto 140th St. Take it to the end and the hotel will be in front on the right

On Site: Cafe 140 Full service restaurant serving breakfast and dinner. Breakfast buffet is available seven days a week along with daily dinner specials. Casual atmosphere. Children's menu available. Cafe 140 is open for: Breakfast, Dinner
Big Apple Market - The Doubletree Hotel's 24-hour restaurant operates like a self-serve deli, with hot and cold food available throughout the day. Casual atmosphere with dine-in or take-out service. Aviators Lounge - Open during lunch and dinner hours, the hotel bar serves snacks, light meals, and cocktails. Happy hour Monday through Friday. Stylish club atmosphere. Complimentary popcorn.
